CustomField.description: Create ResourceAbsnece Records through Trigger instead of Flow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Create ResourceAbsnece Records through Trigger/Flow. True: When Run_LKL__c is enabled, it will create the ResourceAbsence Records in the LKL Trigger. False: The LKL Trigger will not create the ResourceAbsence Records.
CustomField.label: Create ResourceAbsence In Trigger
